global.error: Unfortunately, an error occurred. You will be redirected to the registration window
global.no-messages: Unfortunately, there are no messages yet(

settingsUser.exitSettingsText: Changes will not be saved. Exit profile settings?

addFolder.pattern: You can use Latin, Cyrillic, numbers and 1 space
addFolder.deleteFolder: Are you sure you want to delete this folder?
addFolder.warningDelete: You can not create more then 10 folders

addChat.wrongUrl: The link is invalid. Check the link.

chat-context-menu.delete-from-folder-text: Are you sure you want to delete this chat from the folder?

infoAbout.title: Features of KPD Chat
infoAbout.subtitle: KPD Chat is a web application where anyone can join the discussion of various topics using only a username (without authorization). In the application, you can communicate with more than two users, send them messages, reply to their messages.
infoAbout.func1: provides faster response times and improves user interaction with each other.
infoAbout.func2: chat teaches people to show empathy, sending malicious and offensive messages is not welcome.
infoAbout.func3: chat rooms: online forums or platforms where users can participate in group discussions on specific topics or common interests.

info.welcome-text-p1: Welcome to the world of fast and convenient communication!
info.welcome-text-p2: Join us and start incredible conversations right now.

registration.description: To enter the chat, you need to enter a unique key
registration.error-message: This field is required to fill
registration.input-nickname-error: From 4 to 12 characters, without spaces, only latin and special characters
registration.input-pictureLink-error: The link is not active. Try something else.
registration.enter-description: Copy and save this unique key, it is required to log in to the account.
registration.copy-message: The unique key has been copied
